cohort.description: Array of patient information including tumor and normal BAM files

ref_fasta_index.description: Index of the reference FASTA file

ref_fasta_dict.description: Dictionary file for the reference FASTA

control_vcf_index.description: Index for the control VCF file

merge_bam_threads.description: Number of threads for merging BAM files

cpg_pileup_threads.description: Number of threads for CpG pileup

clairs_platform.description: Platform for ClairS variant calling. Default: hifi_revio. Can also be hifi_sequel2

sv_threads.description: Number of threads for structural variant calling

trf_bed.description: BED file for tandem repeat filtering. Optional but recommended

call_small_variants.description: Enable small variant calling. Default TRUE

use_deepsomatic.description: Use DeepSomatic for small variant calling. TRUE/FALSE. Default is TRUE.
